attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government are out of touch with the people of this country and have lied time and time again over law and order, education the NHS, immigration,pensions,the safety of the british people from the threat of extreamist in this country by failing to deport such people.Therefor I petition a vote of no confidance in this government.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
